mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DC_BOARD_TB WHERE STATUS = 'BSTATUS004' AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY NO

SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO WHERE B.TYPE = 'BSTATUS004' AND B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DC_BOARD_TB WHERE TYPE = 'BSTATUS004' AND STATUS = 'BSTATUS001'

SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'STATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO WHERE B.TYPE = 'BSTATUS004' AND B.NO = #{bno} AND B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DC_BOARD_TB VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{content}, 0, 'BSTATUS004', 'BSTATUS001', #{memberNo}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET STATUS = 'BSTATUS002' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET VIEWCOUNT = VIEWCOUNT + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
